properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: Site Safety Manager reported that a crane stopped hoisting with a load up in the air
properties.Detail_of_Description: There were tripping operations underway. Transducer for load line failed, half of the load line was on the ground. There was no immediate hazard
properties.Cause_Equipment: There were tripping operations underway. Transducer for load line failed, half of the load line was on the ground. There was no immediate hazard. Partial SWO posted

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: Site Safety manager reported Headache Ball on Crane became loose and fell causing shoring to fall on to the scaffold of adjacent building.
properties.Detail_of_Description: Operator was lowering hook to pick up load on the 58th  floor. Headache ball over swung and hit the top of the cocoon system on return. Unlatched from swivel, headache ball  was separated and fell onto load of shoring frames located on diving board  on t
properties.Cause_Equipment: Operator was lowering hook to pick up load on the 58th  floor. Headache ball over swung and hit the top of the cocoon system on return. Unlatched from swivel, headache ball  was separated and fell onto load of shoring frames located on diving board  on t

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: FDNY reported a crane damaged a parapet wall while it was swinging. (MTA site, incident occurred several weeks ago)
properties.Detail_of_Description: There is no crane on the site. There was MTA crane at 25th Street and 11 Ave several weeks ago that struck 555 West 25th Street, causing bricks to fall onto 547 West 25th Street.
properties.Cause_Equipment: There is no crane on the site. There was MTA crane at 25th Street and 11 Ave several weeks ago that struck 555 West 25th Street, causing bricks to fall onto 547 West 25th Street. Three, 4 FT coping stones and approx. 80 bricks were knocked onto the roof

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: FDNY reported fire in the crane, no injuries reported
properties.Detail_of_Description: The crane suffered fire damage in engine and needs to be dismantled
properties.Cause_Equipment: The crane suffered fire damage in engine and needs to be dismantled

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: The Site Safety Manager reported a Crane leaked oil onto the roof of adjacent building.
properties.Detail_of_Description: It appeared that one of the cranes fittings developed a leak and sprayed oil into the neighboring building. Repairs have been completed and arrangements for the cleanup were done
properties.Cause_Equipment: It appeared that one of the cranes fittings developed a leak and sprayed oil into the neighboring building. Repairs have been completed and arrangements for the cleanup were done

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: Site Safety Manager reported, while booming down crane, headache ball hit the worker in his head. Ambulance was called and he was taken to the hospital
properties.Detail_of_Description: The Site Safety Manager reported to DOB that a worker was struck in the head during booming down of a crane. The worker tripped over the wheel dolly while Jib was booming down. Worker was taken to the hospital.
properties.Cause_Equipment: The Site Safety Manager reported to DOB that a worker was struck in the head during booming down of a crane. The worker tripped over the wheel dolly while Jib was booming down. Worker was taken to the hospital.
